price: A fi ’Ishāƙ àti Ya‘ƙūb (ọmọọmọ rẹ̀) ta á lọ́rẹ. A sì ṣe ipò jíjẹ́ Ànábì àti fífúnni ní tírà sínú àrọ́mọdọ́mọ rẹ̀. A fún un ní ẹ̀san rẹ̀ ní ayé yìí. Dájúdájú ní ọ̀run, ó tún wà nínú àwọn ẹni rere.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wajaʿalnā fī dhurriyyatihi al-nubuwata wal-kitāba waātaynāhu ajrahu fī al-dun'yā wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
